vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κάρπος, -ου, ὁ
Carpus: 2Ti.4:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.4.13
§ - Carpus, probably a Christian
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
加布 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "果實"
特羅亞的基督徒, #提後 4:13
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
加布 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "果实"
特罗亚的基督徒, #提后 4:13
